subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Thrashers, who beat the Rangers 6-4 on Wednesday, suit up four black players, and have started to advertise to black audiences in the Atlanta area to broaden the team’s appeal.
snippet: The Thrashers, who beat the Rangers 6-4 on Wednesday, suit up four black players, and have started to advertise to black audiences in the Atlanta area to broaden the team’s appeal.
